code: import React from'react';export function UserLink(props){var username=props.username;var handleUserLink=function handleUserLink(event){window.location.href="/profiles/".concat(username);};return React.createElement("span",{className:"pointer",onClick:handleUserLink},props.children);}export function UserDisplay(props){var user=props.user,includeFullName=props.includeFullName,hideLink=props.hideLink;var nameDisplay=includeFullName===true?"".concat(user.first_name," ").concat(user.last_name," "):null;return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,nameDisplay,hideLink===true?"@".concat(user.username):React.createElement(UserLink,{username:user.username},"@",user.username));}export function UserPicture(props){var user=props.user,hideLink=props.hideLink;var userIdSpan=React.createElement("span",{className:"mx-1 px-3 py-2 rounded-circle bg-dark text-white"},user.username[0]);return hideLink===true?userIdSpan:React.createElement(UserLink,{username:user.username},userIdSpan);}
